content: We have gotten much of our robot working but we messed up the driving and fixed it later the robot works! We are attempting to fix the servo, as it doesn't work yet. otherwise we are figuring out code, servos, teamwork, and bonding with our fellow robotics people.
We have improved the robot significantly but discovered that a part of it was flawed and had to redo a large part of it we also have started our slides.

New Notebook maker, Hayden here, all I did was write in here today. Gray and Issac worked together on the intake, Ismael researched optometry, Dane generally helped everyone having trouble, Gage built linear actuators and played music, and Abram learned about coding. Also, we have rebranded to “Say Watt?” I love it!

We have finally gotten teams together. MechNoSense has started with the robot and the kids are starting to figure out the ropes and what we do. We still need to figure out onshape because currently not everyone has an account.

Another meeting and some more teaching today we started working in groups that may or may not be our final teams. Our setup is MechNoSense is our team of returning Members. Then we have three teams of new members and they are being coached by us (mechnosense) and our designated coaches.

Today is our second official meeting of rocket robotics! We have since learned the hard way that there are a lot of kids for the bunch of us. (There are something like 30 kids we are coaching. But we will persevere) today we sorted our hastily packed boxes with the help of the new kids and the coders have started website building with the more advanced ones and the absolute basics of git and coding with the new ones.
